meanings.definition: The act or process of precessing.
meanings.sent1: During the precessions of the top, it wobbled in a circular motion.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the precessions of the gyroscope to understand its movement.
meanings.sent3: The precessions of the spinning toy made it look like a dancing star.
meanings.sent4: The precessions of the Earth's axis affect the length of a day.
meanings.sent5: The precessions of the pendulum mesmerized the onlookers with their rhythmic sway.

meanings.definition: A slow, conical motion of the axis of a spinning body around another axis due to a torque.
meanings.sent1: The precessions of the spinning top created a mesmerizing pattern in the sand.
meanings.sent2: Astronomers observed the precessions of the planet's axis with great interest.
meanings.sent3: The precessions of the spinning wheel made it look like a spinning dancer.
meanings.sent4: The precessions of the gyroscope resembled a graceful ballet performance.
meanings.sent5: The precessions of the spinning globe were like a slow, elegant dance in space.
